last_episode_to_air.name: The Light at the End of the Tunnel
last_episode_to_air.overview: Although Kashmir has seen brief periods of peace, seven decades of cross-border militancy, constant military presence, wars and political unrest have all effected the pace of development in Kashmir.

name: Kashmir The Story
overview: An insight into the conflict-ridden region of Kashmir, showcasing facts as they are. The purely observational piece of storytelling is an honest attempt to showcase life in the valley.
